snippet: The federal government’s changes to the income-based repayment plan would provide only marginal help for low-income borrowers who are struggling, the New America Foundation said.
abstract: New America Foundation says federal government’s changes to the income-based student loan repayment plan would provide only marginal help for low-income borrowers who are struggling; holds changes would provide big benefits to middle- and high-income borrowers.
lead_paragraph: The federal government’s changes to the income-based repayment plan would provide only marginal help for low-income borrowers who are struggling, the New America Foundation said.

headline.seo: Change to Student Debt Relief Will Help Well-Off the Most, Report Says
headline.main: Well-Off Will Benefit Most From Change to Student Debt Relief Plan, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Well-Off Will Benefit Most From Change to Student Debt Relief Plan, Study Says
